faq.title: What is Nanogram?
faq.body: Nanogramâ€™s goal is to be an all inclusive social media platform providing features that allows users to send, receive, and earn in Nano, while also being a place for users to share their lives with the world. Nanogram is a crypto based platform with an integrated Nano wallet providing the reliability of payment processors without the need for a middle man that you would find when dealing in fiat currencies.
